column4: anyone know a way to do a similar task to "sysprep" on ubuntu?
I don't think Ubiquity, the installer of Ubuntu, has automation of any sort :/
you can do automated installs... but I have a running "image" of what I want... and I want to remove things like the hostname & let it auto-set it & such to make a distributable image.
You'll probably want remastersys, who knows
